summary.Title: Master Data Specialist
summary.Presentation:
We are looking for a Master Data Specialist for our client in the Pharma Industry.
Location: Greater Copenhagen, hybrid.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are looking for a Master Data Specialist for our client in the Pharma Industry.

Location: Greater Copenhagen, hybrid.

QUALIFICATIONS & COMPETENCIES
  • Experience in analyzing business contexts and master data requirements
  • Experience with master data setup and management
  • Experience in engaging with stakeholders to gather requirements and provide support
  • Experience in Supply Chain
  • Experience in SAP solutions
  • Experience from the pharma industry
  • Professional level of English - both oral and written
  • Valid EU work permit making you able to start right away
AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY
  • Business context analysis: understand the business context and specific master data requirements at each site
  • Master data setup: ensure the correct setup of relevant master data in the solution
  • Stakeholder engagement: collaborate with Digital SC Master data to gather LoB requirements, identify pain points, and recommend process improvements
  • Migration support: assist the WareX product analysts in MD related efforts during projects
  • Tool utilization: Participate in testing and development of new tools to mass create or change master data
  • Stakeholder collaboration: work with site-specific stakeholders, e.g., LoB MD Stewards to gather requirements and address concerns
  • Documentation: create and maintain a standard MD approach in WareX deployments
  • Issue resolution: identify and resolve data-related issues
INTERESTED?

Please note that to apply for this position, you must go to our website. We are unable to process CVs sent directly to our email.

If you have questions about the position, please contact us on:

   denmark@rdtengineers.com

The position will be closed when we have found the right candidate, and we encourage you to apply as soon as possible. Notice only your CV in English is necessary.

Passionate about Engineering - RDT

At RDT, our primary focus is our PEOPLE. We support our employees in professional and individual development. With our flat hierarchy, commitment and values, which inspire them to do their best. We pursue our PEOPLE’s work satisfaction and can guarantee highest quality, which leads to our second mission – our CLIENTS. We, our PEOPLE, provide engineering solutions that enable our customers to have a competitive advantage in efficiency, flexibility and costs.

Thanks to our PEOPLE, we have supplied the best engineering services since 2007 and offer the best and most flexible terms in the market for engineering services.

Be part of our missions and join RDT in Denmark.

  • Experience with master data setup and management
